definitions.text: an appraisal of the value of something
examples: he set a high valuation on friendship

definitions.text: act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of
standing or position on a scale
assign a rank or rating to
examples: how would you rank these students?
The restaurant is rated highly in the food guide

definitions.text: be worthy of or have a certain rating

examples: How would you rate his chances to become President?
Gold was rated highly among the Romans

definitions.text: desert one's party or group of friends, for example, for one's personal advantage
employ scabs or strike breakers in
take the place of work of someone on strike
give (hair) the appearance of being fuller by using a rat

examples: He told on his classmate who had cheated on the exam
